attributes.action: remove the petitions section of this website as it is an embarrasment to the good people of the United Kingdom and does not accuratly represent majority opinion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This website has made regular news appearances for the silly and often downright stupid petitions that have appeared on it gathering 1000 or so signatures of misguided on joking people. Should the good people of this nation wish to submit a petition they can do it the proper way by using pen and paper.

These petitions do not accuratly represent public opinion as they are mostly signed by  computer literate (often younger) people, who are aware of this site and have the time and financial resources to use it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
